channel.title: Why do "null"'s keep logging in to my server? what are they? :O
channel.description:
Please help!!
Can anyone tell me what a "null" is when it logs in to my server? The longer it's online the more seem to build up... If i do ::players in-game it counts them as players, but when i kick the server and reboot they disappear. Clienthandler also says "accepted from blah blah ip" ... but nobody actually logs into the server.
Are these hackers or bots or some sort of system thing? or what? :)
Thanks for your help :)

item.title: Why do "null"'s keep logging in to my server? what are they? :O
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“xlxoxoxt, post:8, topic:278173”]They’re from the sites you advertised on they’re checking to see if the server is online.[/quote]I told them that already, but he is saying it’s not that.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do "null"'s keep logging in to my server? what are they? :O

item.title: Why do "null"'s keep logging in to my server? what are they? :O
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

I have 2GB Ram, it doesnt lag, i was just wondering why loads of "null"s were logging in

How can i make an AntiCrash? There’s an AntiLag… resets the server every 30mins…

Any pointers?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

I’ve added it to the mopar server status one and Rune-Server… and it’s on the Runelocus toplists too… would that be why?

It doesn’t crash it atm but they do make me reset it every now and then because theres like 100 on :s[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2009, 09:19:30 am[/size][hr]lol change google to other status websites you know :S
